title: Ticket #740: Add support for VMWare Workstation to Condor's VM Universe
description: Add support for VMWare Workstation to Condor's VM Universe. Preston Smith has provided a patch to do this, reusing most of the code for VMWare Server 1 support.
remarks:
2013-Mar-11 16:57:19 by tannenba:
Note that VMWare Server 1.x, as currently supported in HTCondor, no longer exists - it was end-of-lifed by VMWare and can no longer even be downloaded!

2013-Apr-09 11:50:39 by tlmiller:
I'll go ahead and do the documentation; Jaime may not have time to do the code review (and who'd be better-suited?).
derived_tickets: #3627   Fix VMWare Workstation/Player detection on Windows
